posts.description:
Drove all the way to Yosemite last night and sat in this spot for hours watching the majestic Yosemite Falls crash into the valley. Definitely one of my favorite places on earth! 
@goalzero @optcorp @hippytree

Just got back from backpacking one of the most rugged and remote coastlines in the country. Tons of wildflowers, wildlife, and wild weather‚Ä¶ we couldn‚Äôt have asked for anything more! 
Epic trip in Northern California with @everchanginghorizon & @kylormelton.

Exactly 3 years ago today, it was the morning of my birthday when I packed my van and took off on what has become the biggest adventure of my life! 
With only $81.10 to my name, (not even enough for a full tank of gas) and an inconsistent part time photography job, I knew if I didn‚Äôt fully commit to my dreams then nothing would ever change... So I took a leap of faith and hit the road to pursue my passions. 
I‚Äôve now spent the last 3 years traveling full time while living out of my grandmother's old van that I personally converted into my dream adventure-mobile. 
The people I‚Äôve met, places I‚Äôve been and experiences I‚Äôve had (both good and bad), have significantly changed my life in a positive way. Huge THANK YOU to everyone that has supported my journey along the way! 
My only wish is that I can help inspire a few of you to get out there and chase your own dreams!

CONTEST! Your chance to win a cruise for you and 3 adventurous friends anywhere @royalcaribbean sails!
"Adventure Squad challenge"- Land, Air, or Sea. 
1.Post your most adventurous shot, whether it's thousands of feet in the air or deep underwater.
2.Make sure your profile is public. 
3.Tag 3 friends, #AdventureSquad, #Contest and @royalcaribbean. 
Good luck üôåüèº

A few years ago, before I had the opportunity to travel, I realized that most of my friends and family had been to incredible places all around the world (Europe, AUS, China, etc). I had only taken a few small road trips so I asked them, have you been to Yosemite, Big Sur or the Grand Canyon? Surprisingly, almost all of them said: ‚Äúno, I haven‚Äôt had a chance to make it there yet‚Äù.
Its crazy to me how many people have taken expensive trips to far away lands but haven't even seen their own backyard! So after that, I set out on a road trip around the U.S. to show people that some of the most incredible places in the world are all around us. All you need to do is pack up a car, drive for a few hours and I guarantee you can be somewhere unique and beautiful ...No matter where you live!
Havasu Falls, Arizona with @chelseakauai & @kylormelton.
posts.localization: Havasu Falls, Supai, AZ - Grand Canyon

posts.description:
It‚Äôs crazy to think that 80% of Americans and 1/3 of humanity can no longer see the Milky Way Galaxy due to city light pollution! Be sure to get out to somewhere dark this summer and stare off into the universe. 
Here is a self portrait from this weekend while camping out at @undercanvasmoab in Utah.

This morning we watched the Milky Way Galaxy fade as the pastel colors of sunrise swept over the sky. 
Definitely worth the 4am hike in the dark!
Delicate Arch, Utah with @chelseakauai. 
@optcorp @fujifilmx_us
Roaming with the bison before sunrise near Salt Lake City, Utah.

I want to be honest with you!
...I have this gift, and I'm lucky enough to share it with you sometimes! But I don't always use it in the best ways, in fact, sometimes I feel like I waste it. 
I want you to know that I'm making a conscious effort to use it more wisely, because I never know when I might lose it for good! 
I'll continue to share more with you, but I want you to know that you actually already have the gift too. 
That gift is TIME. So get out there and do something special with it ;)
-Self portrait next to the oldest trees in the world! Single 30 second exposure. 
Ancient Bristlecone Pine Forest, CA.

We recently stayed at a place that didn‚Äôt have a bathroom or shower, the wifi wasn‚Äôt working, the parking lot was about 8 miles away and I think the roof was broken‚Ä¶ I definitely gave it a 5 star rating ;) Southern Utah knows how to accommodate! 
@AmericanAir @Citibank #ad#TravelOn

After jogging most of the way up the trail, we made it just in time to watch the colors dance across the sky before the stars came out. Then we laid at the top, staring at the Milky Way galaxy for a few hours before turning our headlamps on and hiking back down. 
Evening views with @chelseakauai in Zion National Park.
